mail.title: Mail Classifier
mail.subtitle: AI Document Analysis
mail.instruction: Capture the document to analyze the content.
mail.danger_desc: Appears to be important documents like tax or fines.
mail.safe_desc: Appears to be general guides or promotional materials. No need to worry.

pension.title: National Pension Lump-sum Refund
pension.eligible_conditional_met: Eligible as the stay duration requirement is met.
pension.ineligible_conditional_fail: Stay duration requirement (at least 1 year) not fulfilled.
pension.disclaimer_text: The results above are only an estimate, and actual eligibility and amounts may vary. Verify with Official Authority for accurate information.
pension.disclaimer_contact: Inquiries: National Pension Service 1355 (without area code) / www.nps.or.kr

steps.prep_item_2: Air Ticket (e-ticket) - Within 1 Month of Departure
steps.prep_item_3: Copy of Account Holder's Bank Book (Domestic or International)
steps.airport_item_1: Visit the National Pension Service branch before departure to apply for 'Airport Payment'
steps.airport_item_2: Receive a 'Payment Instruction' at Incheon Airport's NPS Consultation Center
steps.airport_item_3: Exchange at Woori Bank Exchange inside the Departure Hall
steps.airport_item_4: Available Currencies: USD, EUR, JPY, etc. (Won not available)
steps.overseas_item_1: Lump-sum Refund Payment Claim Form (Notarization Required)
steps.overseas_item_2: Copy of Account Holder's Bank Book Overseas
steps.overseas_item_3: Copy of Passport and Overseas Immigration Report (for residents abroad)

login.signInDesc: Sign in to access stored data and settings.
login.joinDesc: Join to manage your visa and financial goals.
login.verifyEmailBody: A verification email has been sent. Please check your inbox.
login.emailInUse: Email already registered. Please sign in.
login.linkSentDesc: Account has been created. Please complete the verification via email.
login.notVerifiedYet: Not verified yet. Please check your inbox.

dashboard.safe_desc: Appears to be general guides or promotional materials. No need to worry.

aiChat.title: AI Consultation
aiChat.subtitle: Ask Anything
aiChat.welcomeMessage: Hello! Do you have questions about life in Korea or visas?
aiChat.fetchError: Failed to retrieve AI response. Please try again later.
aiChat.responseError: Sorry, an error occurred and a response cannot be provided.
aiChat.disclaimer: AI responses may not be accurate, verify important information with official sources.
aiChat.systemPrompt: You are an AI assistant helping expats in Korea. Provide accurate and friendly answers regarding visas (especially F-5, F-2), immigration policies, and life in Korea. This is not legal advice, and important matters should be confirmed with HiKorea or professionals. Always respond in this language:

agency.title: Maghanap ng Ahensya ng Pamahalaan
agency.subtitle: Mag hanap ng ahensya ng pamahalaan ayon sa address

description.immigration: Nagsasagawa ng rehistrasyon ng dayuhan, paglabas ng ARC, pag-extend at pagbabago ng visa, at permit sa paninir ahan.
description.community: Nagbibigay ng notification ng pagbabago ng tirahan, paglabas ng certificate, pagre rehistro ng tatak, at serbisyong sibil.
description.global: Nag-aalok ng multilingual na consultation, legal support, employment assistance, at startup programs.
description.multicultural: Nagbibigay ng Korean language education, interpretation services, child education support, at employment linkage.
description.worker: Nag-aalok ng labor consultation, living support, legal counseling, at emergency assistance.

agency.input_placeholder: Ilagay ang address o neighborhood (hal. Yeoksam-dong)

visaDocs.notice: The following list contains general required documents, and additional documents may be requested depending on the immigration office or individual circumstances. (Administrative Scrivener Act Compliance)
visaDocs.legalContent: Right K aims to provide information only and does not offer actual document handling or legal consultation.

f5.ineligibleDesc: Some essential conditions have not been met, or income/score is insufficient.

visaStatus.title: Visa Status Management
visaStatus.infoDesc: The above information is safely stored within the app and not sent externally. Verify with HiKorea for accurate residency period as there may be differences.
visaStatus.scanSuccess: Foreigner Registration Card information updated successfully.
visaStatus.scanError: Could not analyze the image. Please try again.

tax.title: Year-End Tax Adjustment Guide
tax.subtitle: Receive Your '13th Month' Salary
tax.whatIsItDesc: Commonly referred to as the <bold>'13th Month' Salary</bold>. It's the process of recalculating taxes paid over the year to either refund overpaid amounts or collect underpaid ones.
tax.timeline_2_desc: Submit relevant documents to your company.
tax.timeline_3_desc: Check refund amount on the payslip.
tax.doc_2: Details of Credit Card/Cash Receipt Deductions
tax.actionBtn: Go to National Tax Service Hometax
